original_title: Evander Holyfield vs. Riddick Bowe III
overview: Evander Holyfield vs. Riddick Bowe III, billed as "The Final Chapter", was a professional boxing match contested on November 4, 1995. The non-title match marked the third and final fight in the Boweâ€“Holyfield trilogy.
title: Evander Holyfield vs. Riddick Bowe III
